description: Adversaries may search for private key certificate files on compromised systems for insecurely stored credential Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Discover Private Keys
query: (process.command_line:(*dir\ * OR *findstr\ *) AND process.command_line:(*.key* OR *.pgp* OR *.gpg* OR *.ppk* OR *.p12* OR *.pem* OR *.pfx* OR *.cer* OR *.p7b* OR *.asc*))
